alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:56PM EDT until June 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lee County in central South Carolina... Central Calhoun County in central South Carolina... West central Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eastover, or 8 miles southwest of Shaw Air Base, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, St. Matthews, Eastover, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Oakland, Horrel Hill, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Gadsden, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Pinewood, Paxville and Cane Savannah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 131 and 137. Interstate 77 between mile markers 7 and 13. Interstate 95 between mile markers 117 and 118. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
